channel.title: Server crashes after 30 mins being online (if someone clicks on logout)
channel.description:
Hello!
I am running ballscape with some players, but everytime after 30-45 mins if someone logs out, it just crashes and i have to restart the server. I don't get why he does that... I'll get a picture of the error ASAP.
Greetings qeruina

item.title: Server crashes after 30 mins being online (if someone clicks on logout)
item.dc:creator: @qeruina qeruina
item.description:
@qeruina wrote:

No problem man. And yes i know, problem is i am working (this week) so i’m not online many times I’ll try to post it ASAP

Read full topic

@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Sorry it came across as snarky, I was trying my best to be polite

Note that we still can’t answer your question until you post the error.

item.title: Server crashes after 30 mins being online (if someone clicks on logout)
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

In English, “greetings” is generally synonymous with salutations like hello and welcome. It’s also not really used that often. Usually you’d end an informal message with something like thanks, or regards.

item.title: Server crashes after 30 mins being online (if someone clicks on logout)
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If it’s quicker for you, just copy and paste the error from the cmd line (Right click-> Mark --> Highlight text --> Copy --> Paste here). Without the error it’s pretty hard to distinguish your problem.

Is the error occurring WHEN someone logs out, or always 30-45 minutes AFTER they log out?

Read full topic
